content.raw:
I tried this out a bit, but I'm having a bit of a problem.  I built this code, then launched with:

`$ roslaunch srcsim finals.launch final_number:=4 gui:=true`

It then launched everything, and after a few seconds, it seemed to drop Val from a pretty good height, and the controller couldn't recover.  unique.launch seemed to do the same thing.  As a check, I went back to default, and launched with init:=true, and things worked OK there.  I'm going to review the code, but we should look into this.
content.html:
I tried this out a bit, but I'm having a bit of a problem. I built this code, then launched with:

$ roslaunch srcsim finals.launch final_number:=4 gui:=true

It then launched everything, and after a few seconds, it seemed to drop Val from a pretty good height, and the controller couldn't recover. unique.launch seemed to do the same thing. As a check, I went back to default, and launched with init:=true, and things worked OK there. I'm going to review the code, but we should look into this.
